response: Introducing the 2023 Harley Davidson Nightster Special, a new middleweight contender in our lineup. This model boasts features such as LED lighting, premium Brembo brakes, a 3.1-gallon fuel cell for improved handling, selectable ride modes, and adjustable brake and clutch levers. It comes in vivid black, denim, bright billiard blue, and industrial yellow. The Nightster Special now includes a passenger pillion and footpegs as standard, cast aluminum wheels with tire pressure monitoring, and a comfortable 5-inch handlebar riser. Enjoy the convenience of a 4-inch TFT screen for infotainment and an onboard USB charging port. The Nightster Special combines classic style with the performance of the Revolution Max 975T powertrain, making it a thrilling addition to the 2023 lineup.
title: MY23 Nightster & Nightster Special_11_01.mp4
